# trafficSide

**Instance Property**

A value that represents which side of the road the traffic drives on.

## Declaration

```swift
var trafficSide: CPTrafficSide { get set }
```

## Discussion

One of the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPTrafficSide] values that indicates which side of the road traffic drives on; a [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPManeuver] requires this value.

## Providing maneuver information

- **maneuverType**: A value that represents the type of maneuver.
- **roadFollowingManeuverVariants**: An array of strings that represent the names of the road following this maneuver, arranged from most to least preferred.
- **linkedLaneGuidance**: A value that represents lane guidance associated with this maneuver.
- **highwayExitLabel**: A string that describes a highway exit.
